local_intent: Close gripper on white_plate and confirm a stable grasp; retry up to 2 attempts if stability check fails.
assumptions: white_plate detected and localized by DetectObject
end-effector is positioned above plate before closing
gripper actuation and force sensing functional
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase from the global plan: perceive (DetectObject), approach/align (MoveDelta + ApproachAndAlign), act (CloseGripper), and verify (IsGraspStable). Values chosen comply with NODE_LIBRARY port_value_spaces and align with GLOBAL_BT intent.
